import React, {Component} from 'react'; class MegaMenu extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.MegaMenu(); } componentDidMount() { this.MegaMenu(); } MegaMenu(){ var acc = document.getElementsByClassName("accordion"); // var panel = document.getElementsByClassName("panel"); var accNum = acc.length; var i; for(i = 0; i < accNum; i++){ acc[i].addEventListener("click",function (){ this.classList.toggle("active"); var panel = this.nextElementSibling; if(panel.style.maxHeight){ panel.style.maxHeight = null; }else{ panel.style.maxHeight = panel.scrollHeight+ "px"; } }) } } render() { return (
